keyMoments.title: Alliance Meeting with Apoo and Hawkins
keyMoments.description: Kid Pirates participate in a meeting to form an alliance with the On Air Pirates and Hawkins Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Beginning of a major three-way pirate alliance in the New World.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with horns and crossed guns

keyMoments.title: Alliance Meeting with Kid and Hawkins
keyMoments.description: On Air Pirates participate in a meeting to form an alliance with the Kid Pirates and Hawkins Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Beginning of a major three-way pirate alliance in the New World.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with headphones and crossed bones

keyMoments.title: Alliance Meeting with Kid and Apoo
keyMoments.description: Hawkins Pirates participate in a meeting to form an alliance with the Kid Pirates and On Air Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Beginning of a major three-way pirate alliance in the New World.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a sword through it and crossed bones

keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines Saved by Luffy's Group
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines, who were about to give in to despair from the poison gas, are saved when Luffy's group opens the laboratory gate.
keyMoments.significance: Creates cooperation between the Marines and the Straw Hat-Law alliance.

jollyRoger.description: Standard Marine insignia with G-5 designation
